summary: Implements the RNN-Transducer loss using a weighted finite‑state transducer (WFST) formulation, providing access to the internal alignment grid and temporal/unit schemas and supporting state relabeling for flexible loss computation.
business_intent: Facilitates accurate and efficient training of speech‑recognition models that rely on the RNN‑T architecture by delivering a robust, extensible loss calculation based on WFST theory.
